mapper.select: select work_item_id as workItemId, work_type as workType, work_group_id as workGroupId, num_retries as numRetries, status as status, last_failure_reason as lastFailureReason, last_run_time as lastRunTime, version as version, create_time as createTime, update_time as updateTime from work_item where work_group_id = #{groupId}
